author: jeremias
msg: Copied new image loading framework from FOP here as org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.loader.
- Added a work-around for a bug in Java 1.4.2 ImageInputStream.readUnsignedInt() (in PreloaderEPS)
- Removed all remaining dependencies on FOP.
Note: this adds a new dependency on Apache Commons Logging (and Java 1.4).
